markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Eldritch Archer Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1960) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 172 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Eldritch Archer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=59)

**Prerequisites**
expert in at least one type of [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3)

</column>

---

You blend magic with your archery, leading to powerful results.

 If you don't already cast spells from spell slots, you learn to cast spontaneous spells and gain the Cast a Spell activity. You gain a spell repertoire with one cantrip of your choice, from a spell list of your choice. You choose this cantrip from the common spells on your chosen spell list or from other spells to which you have access on that list. This cantrip must require a spell attack roll. You're trained in spell attack rolls and spell DCs for that tradition. Your key spellcasting ability for these spells is Charisma.

 You also gain Eldritch Shot.

<document level="2" id="action-567" />

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the eldritch archer archetype.

<title level="2">Eldritch Archer Dedication leads to...</title>
[Arrow of Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=1968), [Basic Eldritch Archer Spellcasting](/Feats.aspx?ID=1961), [Enchanting Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1962), [Magic Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1963), [Phase Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1967), [Precious Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1964), [Seeker Arrow](/Feats.aspx?ID=1966)
name: Eldritch Archer Dedication
prerequisite: expert in at least one type of bow
prerequisite_markdown: expert in at least one type of [bow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=3)
